Name: Playcraft
About the game: Join the Discord to chat with the community! Simple, fast and fun Make your own online multiplayer games super fast, with intuitive tools and no coding required. Instant iterations [/br] Instantly switch between creating and playing, allowing you to improve and make changes efficiently and quickly. Endless Possibilities In Playcraft, everything is highly customizable from visuals to gameplay. With fully destructible environments, AI characters, spells, physics and more, you can create your own game modes and visual styles! Create team based shooters, platformers, coop or solo adventures games with puzzles, dialogues and cinematics, use portals to connect different worlds together... The only limit is your imagination! Share your creations Share and play games created by the community, we are super excited to discover all your creations! It's a lot of fun to create and play in Playcraft, especially with your friends! See you inside your games!
